definition: paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
to come to the end of a phase (idiom)

sentences.english: In most browsers to select one paragraph at a time, triple-click on it.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數瀏覽器中，三擊以選擇段落。

sentences.english: If you have two or three parts in your sermon, they should be generally balanced in length.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的講章有兩到三個段落，段落長度一般要平衡。

sentences.english: If you have two or three parts in your sermon, they should be generally balanced in length.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的講章有兩到三個段落，段落長度一般要平衡。

sentences.english: Write the words in front of, summing up the work starting.
sentences.chinese: 即寫在前面的話，工作總結起始的段落。

sentences.english: The immediate war was over, that really was what the cultural wars were about.
sentences.chinese: 緊迫感沒有了，當時的文化論戰也就告一段落了。

sentences.english: Note that Alex now has four body paragraphs.
sentences.chinese: 現在Alex文章有了四個正文段落。

sentences.english: Douglas had his own treasured jokes and sequences in the original radio series.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯自己對廣播劇中某些笑話和段落十分珍視。

sentences.english: Aligns a paragraph to the left, right, or center.
It shows how the formatting gets carried down to the next paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 它說明了格式如何延續到下一個段落。

sentences.english: The Adagio section ends in a relatively subdued and bright mood.
sentences.chinese: 慢板於此處帶著節制的開朗情緒中暫時告一段落。

sentences.english: The following sections explain these concepts in more detail.
sentences.chinese: 下述的段落中更詳細地闡明瞭這些概念。

sentences.english: Sentence group is a processing unit between sentence and paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 句羣是介於句子和段落之間的一個處理單位。

sentences.english: First paragraphs can often be struck out.
sentences.chinese: 第一段落經常會被三振出局。

sentences.english: Indentation or Space After a Paragraph?
All her friends were paragraphed n last Monday's paper.
sentences.chinese: 她將所有的朋友都進行了段落描寫。

sentences.english: Omit the questionable passage and draw back from the edge.
sentences.chinese: 省去可疑的段落，從剽竊的邊緣上抽身而退。

definition: discourse/group of sentences with clear meaning/narrative
fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
